actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of section 602 of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management.

official_title: A joint resolution disapproving the Legalization of Marijuana for Medical Treatment Initiative of 1998.

summary.text: Disapproves the action of the District of Columbia Council on November 3, 1998, The Legalization of Marijuana for Medical Treatment Initiative of 1998, approved by the electors of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A joint resolution disapproving the Legalization of Marijuana for Medical Treatment Initiative of 1998.
